title: House of the Dragon
info: +18 · 2022–present · Action, Adventure, Drama · 60 minutes per episode
description: A prequel to 'Game of Thrones,' set 200 years before the events of the original series, chronicling the Targaryen civil war for control of the Iron Throne.

title: Wednesday
description: A twisted coming-of-age story following Wednesday Addams as she attends Nevermore Academy, mastering her psychic ability and uncovering dark secrets in a supernatural mystery.

title: The Witcher
info: +18 · 2019–present · Action, Adventure, Drama · 60 minutes per episode
description: Based on the popular book series, 'The Witcher' follows Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster hunter, as he struggles to find his place in a world full of dangerous creatures.

title: Shadow and Bone
info: +16 · 2021–present · Action, Adventure, Drama · 60 minutes per episode
description: In a war-torn world, Alina Starkov discovers a power that could unite her country. She must navigate treacherous politics and magical forces to save the world.

title: Good Omens
info: +12 · 2019 · Adventure, Comedy, Drama · 60 minutes per episode
description: A demon and an angel team up to prevent the apocalypse after growing fond of Earth, in this quirky adaptation of the beloved novel by Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett.

title: Locke & Key
info: +16 · 2020–2022 · Drama, Fantasy, Horror · 60 minutes per episode
description: After their father's murder, three siblings move into their ancestral home and discover magical keys that unlock powers and secrets, all while battling dark forces.
